description: Alaska Measure 2. Repeals open primaries and ranked choice voting.
summary: This ballot measure would repeal Alaska's open primary system in which the top four vote recipients, regardless of party, advance to the general election. It also would repeal the use of ranked choice voting in general elections.

description: Arizona Proposition 314. Allows police to arrest immigrants who enter the U.S. illegally.
summary: This ballot measure would allow police to arrest immigrants who don't cross the border at a legal port of entry and would make it a state crime for people living in the U.S. illegally to apply for public benefits. It also would create a crime of selling fentanyl that causes someone's death.
